abstract: The Media Equation column in Business Day on Monday, about the relationship of Fox News with reporters who cover it, misidentified the owner of TV Guide. It is the Macrovision Solutions Corporation, not the News Corporation, which completed the magazine’s sale to Macrovision in May.
snippet: The Media Equation column in Business Day on Monday, about the relationship of Fox News with reporters who cover it, misidentified the owner of TV Guide. It is the Macrovision Solutions Corporation, not the News Corporation, which completed the ma...
lead_paragraph: The Media Equation column in Business Day on Monday, about the relationship of Fox News with reporters who cover it, misidentified the owner of TV Guide. It is the Macrovision Solutions Corporation, not the News Corporation, which completed the magazine’s sale to Macrovision in May.
